configure.title: Configure {provider}
configure.description: Enter your {token_label} and optionally select a model

data_description.gemini_token: Enter your Google Gemini API key
data_description.model: Choose a predefined model or select 'Custom...' to enter your own
data_description.custom_model: Enter a custom model name (only used if 'Custom...' is selected above)

data_description.gemini_token: Enter your Google Gemini API key
data_description.model: Choose a predefined model or select 'Custom...' to enter your own
data_description.custom_model: Enter a custom model name (only used if 'Custom...' is selected above)
data_description.custom_system_prompt: Add a custom prompt that will be prepended to all your messages. Use *User MSG* or {USER_MSG} as a placeholder for your message.

configure_defaults.title: Default Settings
configure_defaults.description: Set the default provider and model for HomeMind Ai. This will be selected automatically when you open the HomeMind Ai page.

data_description.default_provider: Select which provider should be selected by default when opening HomeMind Ai
data_description.default_model: Select which model should be selected by default (optional, uses provider's configured model if not set)

error.gemini_token: Google Gemini API key is required

init.title: Default Settings
init.description: Set the default provider and model for HomeMind Ai. This will be selected automatically when you open the HomeMind Ai page.

data_description.default_provider: Select which provider should be selected by default when opening HomeMind Ai
data_description.default_model: Select which model should be selected by default (optional, uses provider's configured model if not set)
